title: Techme数据集
text: varsList：data set containing variables additional information, unit, chn_name, eng_name etc., wide data format. Totally 610 rows.

NO_num decomposed Number NKRDP, 'num' part digits 7 8 NO_num_p1 decomposed Number NKRDP, 'num_p1' part digits 2 NO_num_p2 decomposed Number NKRDP, 'num_p2' part digits 5 6 NO_tail decomposed Number NKRDP, 'tail' part usually "NA" '*'

code: cap_note <- "This is a note, ba la ba la" cap_source <- "source from yearbook 2021" if (FALSE) {  add_footer_pure(cap_note)  cat("\n")  add_footer_pure(cap_source, type = "source") }

text: df, data frame, contains target institution column target_institution, character, column name target institution target_province, character, target output column name province variable.

title: Helper Function to match and get province of target institution — get_province_of_institution
code: library(magrittr) utils::data("PubObsStation",package = "techme") tbl_read <- PubObsStation %>%   dplyr::select(-province)  tbl_out <- get_province_of_institution(df = tbl_read,   target_institution ="institution",   target_province = "province")  head(tbl_out) #> # A tibble: 6 × 6 #>   officer  year index name                       institution           province #>   <chr>   <dbl> <chr> <chr>                      <chr>                 <chr>    #> 1 MOA      2018 1     国家土壤质量德州观测实验站 中国农业科学院农业资… 北京     #> 2 MOA      2018 2     国家土壤质量祁阳观测实验站 中国农业科学院农业资… 北京     #> 3 MOA      2018 3     国家土壤质量昌平观测实验站 中国农业科学院农业资… 北京     #> 4 MOA      2018 4     国家土壤质量洛龙观测实验站 中国农业科学院农业资… 北京     #> 5 MOA      2018 5     国家植物保护甘谷观测实验站 中国农业科学院植物保… 北京     #> 6 MOA      2018 6     国家种质资源管城观测实验站 中国农业科学院郑州果… 河南

title: Get names from basic variables table — get_vars
text: list

title: Get names from basic variables table — get_vars
code: options(encoding = "UTF-8") block_sel <- list(block1 ="v7", block2="sctj", block3 ="nyjx", block4= c("zdl","dztlj","xtlj", "dztlj_pt","xtlj_pt", "pgddj","pgcyj"))  vars_set <-  get_vars(df = varsList, block = block_sel, what = "variables")
